ATVI For people who dont understand mobile gaming and how this affects the Chinese market please read thisChina is a dictatorship where they monitor and prevent their people from gaming however much they want to Dont quote me on this but I believe the max is 8 hours of gaming per person per day Mobile gaming will change the game and make it so the government in China cant restrict the time spent in video games So now a gamer and play 8 hours of their preferred game then when they get kicked out of their internet cafe they can play on their mobile device until they are satisfied Chinese population is 14 billion which is roughly 4 Chinese for every 1 American Tencent has been working with Blizzard to gain entrance into the Chinese market which is very hard to accomplish This is something no other competitors can get easily ATVI is worth 220 by 2022Show More
